MR4 Review at Gamecritics.com
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2004 Topics (Year of the Venture): MR4 Review at Gamecritics.com
By Lisa Shock on Wednesday, January 14, 2004 - 11:46 pm:

So, I stumbled on this review the other day, and it inspired me to go out and read some of the online reviews of MR4. Anyway, I think the author of the article actully took time to play MR4, and really covers the game well. Most of the other online reviews seem like rushed out copies of each other's opinions, that is to say very watered down commentary based on very few hours of actually playing the game.

By Darkstar on Thursday, January 29, 2004 - 08:10 am:

You are right Lisa. This is the first one I've read online that actually knew what they were talking about. Most are very vague and shallow. I think other than this one I've read one that sounded like the person had actually played the game.
